name: Tiffany
description: Tiffany the Stargazer is a very friendly girl, and calls people stars when she praises them. Some might think it's slightly mocking, but the praises come straight from her heart.

passiveSkill.name: Prophecy
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "Tiffany's DMG to Summoned increases by {placeholder}, and her CRIT Rate in battle increases by {placeholder}."}

uniqueSkill.name: Brilliant Light
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "The brilliant lights from the stars cleanse the void. Tiffany attacks an enemy row and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage. Enemy's summoned hit by this attack are killed immediately."}

specialSkill.name: Sea of Stars
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Shadow of a phantom, hope within desperation. Tiffany attacks an enemy row and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage. Enemy's summoned take additional {placeholder} damage.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Star Power
normalSkill.description: Tiffany summons the fallen stars. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.

templateData.lens4.skill: The brilliant lights from the stars cleanse the void. Tiffany attacks an enemy row and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage. Enemy's summoned hit by this attack are killed immediately.
templateData.lens5.skill: Tiffany's DMG to Summoned increases by {placeholder}, and her CRIT Rate in battle increases by {placeholder}.
templateData.lens6.skill: Shadow of a phantom, hope within desperation. Tiffany attacks an enemy row and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage. Enemy's summoned take additional {placeholder} damage.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}
